rows.label: tlk70000044_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Friends have been busy, Morimori hear!
Impressive deeds! Great fame!

rows.label: tlk70000044_03_msg0002
rows.name:
Friends know who also became
famous?

rows.label: tlk70000044_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Morimori! Now renowned as great
gourmet among Nopon!

rows.label: tlk70000044_03_msg0004
rows.name:
If we go on, Iira will soon become
buzzing place of fierce warriors and
delicate palates.
